root.name: Marvel Super Heroes in War of the Gems
root.description: OverviewThe game lets you select up to either of these Marvel super heroes: Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Wolverine, and Spider-Man. The setting of this game takes place both around the globe and outer space. Most of the game is based on the heroes finding the Infinity Gems. Once a hero finds a gem, he can equip it and the gem provides him a certain unique power. The final gem is obtained by defeating Thanos, in which in result, completes the game.
